description: Your wedding day is one of the most important moments of your life, and your hair should be just as memorable. Specialising in bridal hair, I’ll work with you to design a look that complements your vision and makes you feel amazing. From elegant updos to soft, romantic waves, I ensure your hair stays flawless from the first photo to the last dance. With a calm, personal approach, I’m here to make your bridal hair experience stress-free and unforgettable.

values.name: BRIDES TRIAL
values.description: 2 hr appt at home salon or mobile if travel is covered

values.name: BRIDAL PARTY TRIAL
values.description: 1.5 hr appt at home salon or mobile if done with bride’s trial

values.name: EMERALD PACKAGE
values.description: 1 Bride trial, Bride on day, 2 adult bridal party members

values.name: RUBY PACKAGE
values.description: 1 Bride trial, Bride on day, 3 adult bridal party members

values.name: DIAMOND PACKAGE
values.description: 1 Bride trial, Bride on day, 4 adult bridal party members
